hero.title: About Erad
hero.subtitle: Accounting-first ERP implementation for UAE SMEs

who_we_are.title: Who We Are
description: We are a team of experts in both accounting and automation, with a blend of experiences in multiple industries: trading, property management, distribution, contracting, services (shipping and clearance, admin services), hospitality (restaurants and hotels), and startups.
Over 15+ years in the UAE and Middle East, we have been able to deliver robust accounting and tax consultancies and services along with solid automation systems with the help of the Odoo framework.
Our approach is practical, not theoretical — we understand real business challenges because we've solved them across dozens of companies.

items.title: Accounting-First ERP
items.content: Most ERP projects fail because accounting is an afterthought. At Erad, accountants lead the Odoo implementation — not just IT guys.

items.title: SME-Focused Solutions
items.content: We understand the unique challenges of small and medium businesses. Our solutions scale with your growth, not against it.

items.title: TAX & TAX Expertise
items.content: Deep understanding of UAE tax regulations ensures your business stays compliant and protected from penalties.

items.title: Practical, Not Theoretical
items.content: We deliver real-world solutions that work for your business today, with the flexibility to grow tomorrow.

hero.title: TAX Compliance Without Penalties
hero.description: TAX compliance in the UAE is not optional. Mistakes can lead to fines, audits, and business disruption. Erad provides end-to-end TAX consultancy services to help SMEs stay compliant, accurate, and protected.

hero.title: Fix Broken Accounting Systems Before They Cost You

warning_signs.title: Signs Your Books Are Broken
warning_signs.subtitle: Do any of these sound familiar?
signs: TAX returns don't match accounting records
Historical data is incomplete or inaccurate

items.description: Fix misclassified transactions and journal entries
Correct TAX rates, codes, and reconciliation issues
Reconcile and validate all opening balances
Restructure for UAE compliance and clarity

steps.description: Comprehensive review of current accounting records and systems

steps.description: Identify all discrepancies, errors, and compliance gaps

steps.title: Verification & Documentation

steps.description: Identify potential compliance gaps and audit triggers
